|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Gliding.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = 네 가르침 덕분에 실력이 빨리 늘었어. 아, 나, 나도 바보는 아니야. 그 정도는 안다고! 엥, 왜 웃어? 좋아, 시합하자고, 지금 당장!

|vo_07_01_title      = 「신의 눈」에 대해…
|vo_07_01_friendship = 4

|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = 신의 눈, 신이 날 인정했다는 거겠지. 그래, 난 최고의 정찰 기사가 될 거야!

|vo_08_02_tl         = Is Acting Grandmaster Jean still working...? Come on, let's go and have a cup of coffee with her.

|vo_08_03_title      = 리사에 대해・이야기 듣기
|vo_08_03_friendship = 4
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About [[Lisa]]: Listening to Stories
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Lisa - Listening to Stories.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = 한가해지면 같이 리사한테 가보자! 전에 드래곤 스파인에 있는 보물 이야기를 듣다가 말았거든, 으… 다음 내용이 궁금해!
|vo_08_03_rm         = Hangahaejimyeon gachi Risahante gaboja! Jeone Deuragon Seupaine itneun bomul iyagireul deutdaga maratgeodeun, eu... Daeum naeyong'i gunggeumhae!
|vo_08_03_tl         = When you're free, let's go to Lisa together! I was listening to a story about a treasure in Dragonspine before, ugh... I'm so curious about what will happen next!

|vo_08_04_title      = 리사에 대해・감탄
|vo_08_04_friendship = 4
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About Lisa: Admiration
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Lisa - Admiration.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = 리사는 잠자는 시간 외엔 책만 보는 것 같아! 정말 대단해. 난 그렇게 엉덩이가 무겁지 않아
|vo_08_04_rm         = Risaneun jamjaneun sigan oe'en chaekman boneun geot gata! Jeongmal daedanhae. Nan geureotge eongdeong'iga mugeopji ana.
|vo_08_04_tl         = It seems like Lisa only reads books except when she's sleeping! That's so great. I can't sit down for that long.

|vo_08_05_title      = 케이아에 대해・우려
|vo_08_05_friendship = 4
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About [[Kaeya]]: Concerns
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kaeya - Concerns.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = …뭔가 불안한 느낌! 방금 케이아 선배와 함께 있었지? 케이아 선배가 귀찮게 굴지 않았어?
|vo_08_05_rm         = ...Mwonga buranhan neukkim! Banggeum Keia seonbaewa hamkke isseotji? Keia seonbaega gwichanke gulji anasseo?
|vo_08_05_tl         = ...I feel kind of uneasy! You were just with Kaeya, right? Didn't he bother you?

|vo_08_06_title      = 케이아에 대해・원흉
|vo_08_06_friendship = 4
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About Kaeya: Culprit
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kaeya - Culprit.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = 화단의 민들레가 시들시들해 보이네. 흠… 분명 그 녀석 짓이야!
|vo_08_06_rm         = Hwadanui mindeullega sideulsideulhae boine. Heum... Bunmyeong geu nyeoseok jisiya!
|vo_08_06_tl         = The dandelions on the flower garden seem to be wilting. Hmm... It's definitely his act!

|vo_08_07_title      = 베넷에 대해…
|vo_08_07_friendship = 4
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Bennett]]
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Bennett.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = 응? 베넷이라…. 어디서 들어본 것 같은데{{sic|...|hide=1}} 아! 모험가 길드의 그 열정적인 남자애. 응, 비경 근처에서 가끔 만난 적 있어. 보물찾기에 아주 열성이더라구
|vo_08_07_rm         = Eung? Benesira... Eodiseo dereobon geot gateunde... A! Moheomga Guildeu-ui geu yeoljeongjeogin namja'ae. Eung, bigyeong geuncheoeseo gakkeum mannan jeok isseo. Bomulchatgie aju yeolseong'ideoragu.
|vo_08_07_tl         = Huh? Bennett.... I think I've heard of him somewhere... Ah! The passionate boy from the Adventurer's Guild. Yep, I've met him a few times near domains. He seemed to be really enthusiastic for treasure hunting.

|vo_08_08_title      = 클레에 대해…
|vo_08_08_friendship = 4
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About [[Klee]]
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Klee.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = 클레는 장난이 종종 심하지만, 기사단 사람들은 모두 클레를 좋아해. 음… 또 진에게 잡혀 갇히는 일이 없도록 잘 지켜봐야겠어
|vo_08_08_rm         = Keulleneun jangnan'i jongjong simhajiman, gisadan saramdeureun modu Keullereul joahae. Eum... Ddo Jinege japhyeo gachineun iri eopdorok jal jikyeobwayagesseo.
|vo_08_08_tl         = Klee often pulls nasty pranks, but everyone in the Knights likes her. Umm... I should keep an eye on her so she doesn't get locked in by Jean again.

|vo_08_09_title      = 알베도에 대해…
|vo_08_09_friendship = 4
|vo_08_09_subtitle   = About [[Albedo]]
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Albedo.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx         = 알베도는 대부분 공방에 틀어박혀서 뭔가 대단한 것들을 연구하지. 하지만 볼 때마다 뭘 생각하고 있는지 통 모르겠어. 흠, 도저히 짐작이 안 돼…
|vo_08_09_rm         = Albedoneun daebubun gongbang'e teureobakyeoseo mwonga daedanhan geotdeureul yeonguhaji. Hajiman bol ttaemada mwol saenggakhago itneunji tong moreugesseo. Heum, dojeohi jimjagi an dwae...
|vo_08_09_tl         = Albedo is usually stuck on his workshop, researching something great. But I don't know what he's thinking of every time I see him. Hmm, I can't guess anything at all...

|vo_08_10_title      = 노엘에 대해…
|vo_08_10_friendship = 4
|vo_08_10_subtitle   = About [[Noelle]]
|vo_08_10_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Noelle.ogg
|vo_08_10_tx         = 노엘? 노엘은 근성이 정말 강하지. 네가 선배니까 그 애를 좀 잘 돌봐줘
|vo_08_10_rm         = Noel? Noereun geunseong'i jeongmal ganghaji. Nega seonbaenikka geu aereul jom jal dolbwajwo.
|vo_08_10_tl         = Noelle? Noelle has a strong will. Since you're her senior, take care of her.

|vo_08_11_title      = 유라에 대해…
|vo_08_11_friendship = 4
|vo_08_11_subtitle   = About [[Eula]]
|vo_08_11_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Eula.ogg
|vo_08_11_tx         = 유라는 내 좋은 친구야! 유라의 농담에 적응하면 친해지기 쉽다는 걸 알 수 있어. 유라는 가문의 성씨 때문에 항상 사람들한테 오해받거든. 어떻게 해야 사람들이 걔를 이해해줄까…?
|vo_08_11_rm         = Yuraneun nae joeun chinguya! Yura-ui nongdame jeogeunghamyeon chinhaejigi swipdaneun geol al su isseo. Yuraneun gamunui seongssi ttaemune hangsang saramdeulhante ohaebatgeodeun. Eotteotge haeya saramdeuri gyaereul ihaehaejulkka...?
|vo_08_11_tl         = Eula's my good company! If you get used to Eula's jokes, you'll know that it's easy to be her friend. She's always misunderstood because of her family name. What can I do to make people understand her...?

|vo_08_12_title      = 콜레이에 대해…
|vo_08_12_friendship = 4
|vo_08_12_quest      = Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises
|vo_08_12_subtitle   = About [[Collei]]
|vo_08_12_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Collei.ogg
|vo_08_12_tx         = 콜레이가 편지로 「비늘병」이 완치되었다고 알려줬어…. 정말 다행이야! 지금 당장 날아가서 꽉 껴안아 주고 싶어. 몬드에 있는 우리가 많이 보고 싶나 봐. 홀로서기 할 수 있는 날이 오면 와서 직접 성장 스토리를 들려주겠대…. 아, 다음 하르파스툼 축제 때 만날 수 있었으면 좋겠다. 벌써 기대돼!
|vo_08_12_rm         = Kollei-ga pyeonjiro "Bineulbyeong"-i wanchidoe'eotdago allyeojwosseo.... Jeongmal dahaeng-iya! Jigeum dangjang naragaseo kkwak kkyeoana jugo sipeo. Mondeu-e inneun uri-ga mani bogo simna bwa. Holloseogi hal su inneun nari omyeon waseo jikjeop seongjang seutori-reul deullyeojugetdae.... A, da'eum Hareupaseutum Chukje ttae mannal su isseosseumyeon joketda. Beolsseo gidaedwae!
|vo_08_12_tl         = 

|vo_08_13_title      = 미카에 대해…
|vo_08_13_friendship = 4
|vo_08_13_subtitle   = About [[Mika]]
|vo_08_13_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Mika.ogg
|vo_08_13_tx         = 아! 미카는 유라의 오랜 대원이야. 처음에는 나와 유라가 친해서 그런지 나한테도 대장님이라고 불렀어. 내 정찰 노하우를 알려준 뒤부터는 계속 선배라고 부르는데… 어찌나 쑥스럽던지. 맡고 있는 분야가 다른데 선후배가 어디 있어. 지도를 그리는 건 미카가 전문가라 난 아무리 해도 따라잡을 수 없는걸
|vo_08_13_rm         = A! Mikaneun Yura-ui oraen daewoniya. Cheoeumeneun nawa Yuraga chinhaeseo geureonji nahantedo daejangnimirago bulleosseo. Nae jeongchal nohaureul allyeojun dwibuteoneun gyesok seonbaerago bureuneunde... eojjina ssukseureopdeonji. Matgo itneun bunyaga dareunde seonhubaega eodi isseo. Jidoreul geurineun geon Mikaga jeonmungara nan amuri haedo ttarajabeul su eopneungeol.
|vo_08_13_tl         = Ah! Mika is Eula's long co-worker. He called me Captain at first, maybe because me and Eula are close friends. After I taught him my scout know-hows, he keeps calling me a senior... how embarrassing. We specialize on different things, there is no thing such as senior and junior. Mika is a professional in drawing maps, I can't surpass him no matter how hard I try.

|vo_09_01_title      = 엠버에 대해 알기・첫 번째
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = 나도 사냥 잘해! 어때, 내 솜씨 좀 볼래? 아니면… 사냥 시합 한판 할까?
|vo_09_01_rm         = Nado sanyang jalhae! Eottae, nae somssi jom bollae? Animyeon... Sanyang sihap hanpan halkka?
|vo_09_01_tl         = I can hunt well, too! Come on, would you like to see my skills? Or... do you want to have a hunting match?

|vo_09_02_title      = 엠버에 대해 알기・두 번째
|vo_09_02_friendship = 3
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = 어떻게 비행 챔피언이 됐는지 알려줄게! 가장 중요한 건 용기야!
|vo_09_02_rm         = Eotteotge bihaeng chaempieoni dwaetneunji allyeojulge! Gajang jungyohan geon yonggiya!
|vo_09_02_tl         = I'll tell you how I became the flying champion! What's most important is courage!

|vo_09_03_title      = 엠버에 대해 알기・세 번째
|vo_09_03_friendship = 4
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 사실 난 수수께끼 잘 못 맞혀, 하르파스툼 축제에서 수수께끼 맞히기 코너는 항상 돌아서 가지…. 넌 안 그래?
|vo_09_03_rm         = Sasil nan susukkekki jal mot machyeo, Hareupaseutum chukje'eseo susukkekki machigi coneoneun hangsang doraseo gaji... Neon an geurae?
|vo_09_03_tl         = Actually, I'm not that good at riddles, I always go around the riddles corner in the Harparstum festival.... You don't?

|vo_09_04_title      = 엠버에 대해 알기・네 번째
|vo_09_04_friendship = 5
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = 난 할아버지 때문에 기사단에 가입했어. 그리고 진 단장 때문에 기사단에 남았지. 이제 너와 함께 몬드 이외의 세상을 구경하게 돼서 기뻐
|vo_09_04_rm         = Nan harabeoji ttaemune gisadane gaiphaesseo. Geurigo Jin danjang ttaemune gisadane namajji. Ije neowa hamkke Mondeu iweui sesang'eul gugyeonghage dwaeseo gippeo.
|vo_09_04_tl         = I joined the Knights because of my grandfather. And I stayed because of Acting Grandmaster Jean. Now, I'm happy to see a world outside Mond with you.

|vo_09_05_title      = 엠버에 대해 알기・다섯 번째
|vo_09_05_friendship = 6
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = 난 더 멀리 나가고 싶어. 하늘의 끝을 보고 싶다고! 너도 계속 나와 함께할 거지?
|vo_09_05_rm         = Nan deo meolli nagago sipeo. Haneul-ui kkeuteul bogo sipdago! Neodo gyesok nawa hamkkehal geoji?
|vo_09_05_tl         = I want to go farther. I want to see the end of the sky! You'll always be with me, right?

|vo_10_01_title      = 엠버의 취미…
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = 내 취미는 토끼 백작을 꾸미는 거야
|vo_10_01_rm         = Nae chwimineun tokki baekjageul kkumineun geoya.
|vo_10_01_tl         = My hobby is to decorate Count Bunny.

|vo_10_02_title      = 엠버의 고민…
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg

|vo_10_02_rm         = Eum... Eotteotge haeya masineun dalbitpaireul mandeul su itneunji ara?
|vo_10_02_tl         = Hmm... Do you know how to make delicious Moon Pie?

|vo_10_03_title      = 좋아하는 음식…
|vo_10_03_subtitle   = Favorite Food

|vo_10_03_rm         = Jin danjang'i tan keopineun hyang'i choegoya! Neodo eonje hanbeon masyeobwa.
|vo_10_03_tl         = Acting Grandmaster Jean's coffee has the best scent! You should drink it some time.

|vo_10_04_title      = 싫어하는 음식…

|vo_10_04_rm         = Gorigori juseuman aniramyeon... Da gyeondil su isseo!
|vo_10_04_tl         = I can bear with anything... Except for frozen Wolfhook Juice!

|vo_12_01_title      = 생일…
|vo_12_01_subtitle   = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = 헤헤헤, 생일 축하해! 자, 받아, 내가 직접 바느질한 「토끼 백작 특제품」이야…. 걱정 마! 특제품이라고, 폭발하지 않아!
|vo_12_01_rm         = Hehehe, saeng'il chukhahae! Ja, bada, naega jikjeop baneujilhan "Tokki Baekjak Teukjepum"iya... Geokjeong ma! Teukjepumirago, pokbalhaji ana!
|vo_12_01_tl         = Hehehe, happy birthday! Here, have this, It's "Specially Made Count Bunny" that I sewed by myself.... Don't worry! It's specially made, it won't explode!

|vo_13_01_title      = 돌파의 느낌・기
|vo_13_01_ascension  = 1
|vo_13_01_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  01.ogg

|vo_13_01_rm         = Wa! Sunpung'eul tan geot manyang gabyeounde~
|vo_13_01_tl         = Wow! I feel so light as if I'm catching a fair wind~

|vo_13_02_title      = 돌파의 느낌・승
|vo_13_02_ascension  = 2
|vo_13_02_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  02.ogg

|vo_13_02_rm         = Jigeumui sokdoramyeon nugudo ttaraol su eopgetji!?
|vo_13_02_tl         = With my current speed, no one will be able to follow me, right!?

|vo_13_03_title      = 돌파의 느낌・전
|vo_13_03_ascension  = 4
|vo_13_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx         = 몬드의 하늘이 작아진 것 같아…. 아니면 내 시야가 넓어진 건가?
|vo_13_03_rm         = Mondeu-ui haneuri jagajin geot gata... Animyeon nae siyaga neolbeojin geonga?
|vo_13_03_tl         = It feels like Mondstadt's sky became smaller.... Or did my sight become broad?

|vo_13_04_title      = 돌파의 느낌・결
|vo_13_04_ascension  = 6
|vo_13_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx         = 지금의 난 처음 만났을 때보다 훨씬 강해졌지? 헤헤, 진짜 고마워! 내가 허니캐럿그릴을 대접할게. 날 따라와! 얼른~
|vo_13_04_rm         = Jigeumui nan cheoeum manasseul ttaeboda hwolssin ganghaejyeotji? Hehe, jinjja gomawo! Naega heonikaereotgeurireul daejeophalge. Nal ttarawa! Eolleun~
|vo_13_04_tl         = I've become stronger than who I was when we met for the first time, right? Hehe, thanks a lot! I'll treat you some Sticky Honey Roast. Follow me! Come on~
